verses.verse: But <S%H4480>after<s%> a <S%H3117>while,<s%> in the <S%H3117>time<s%> of <S%H2406>wheat<s%> <S%H7105>harvest,<s%> it <S%H1961>came<s%> about that <S%H8123>Samson<s%> <S%H6485>visited<s%> his <S%H802>wife<s%> with a <S%H1423>young<s%> <S%H5795>goat,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "I will <S%H935>go<s%> in to my <S%H802>wife<s%> in [her] <S%H2315>room.<s%>" But her father did not <S%H1>let<s%> him <S%H5414>enter.<s%>

And her father <S%H1>said,<s%> "I <S%H559>really<s%> <S%H559>thought<s%> that you <S%H559>hated<s%> her <S%H8130>intensely;<s%> so I <S%H8130>gave<s%> her to your <S%H5414>companion.<s%> Is not her <S%H4828>younger<s%> <S%H6996>sister<s%> <S%H269>more<s%> <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2896>beautiful<s%> <S%H2896>than<s%> she? <S%H4480>Please<s%> let her be yours <S%H4994>instead.<s%>"

<S%H8123>Samson<s%> then <S%H559>said<s%> to them, <S%H6471>"This<s%> <S%H6471>time<s%> I shall be <S%H5352>blameless<s%> in <S%H4480>regard<s%> to the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> I <S%H6213>do<s%> them <S%H9567>harm.<s%>"

And <S%H8123>Samson<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> and <S%H3920>caught<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7776>foxes,<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H3940>torches,<s%> and <S%H6437>turned<s%> [the foxes] <S%H2180>tail<s%> to <S%H2180>tail,<s%> and <S%H7760>put<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3940>torch<s%> in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2180>tails.<s%>

When he had <S%H1197>set<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> to the <S%H3940>torches,<s%> he <S%H7971>released<s%> the foxes into the <S%H7054>standing<s%> <S%H7054>grain<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines,<s%> thus <S%H1197>burning<s%> up <S%H4480>both<s%> the <S%H1430>shocks<s%> and the <S%H7054>standing<s%> <S%H7054>grain,<s%> <S%H5704>along<s%> with the <S%H3754>vineyards<s%> [and] <S%H2132>groves.<s%>

Then the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4310>"Who<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%>?" And they <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H8123>"Samson,<s%> the son-in-law of the <S%H8554>Timnite,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> he <S%H3947>took<s%> his <S%H802>wife<s%> and <S%H5414>gave<s%> her to his <S%H4828>companion.<s%>" So the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H5927>came<s%> up and <S%H8313>burned<s%> her and her father with <S%H1>fire.<s%>

And <S%H8123>Samson<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to them, <S%H518>"Since<s%> you <S%H6213>act<s%> like <S%H2088>this,<s%> I will <S%H3588>surely<s%> <S%H518><s%> <S%H5358>take<s%> <S%H5358>revenge<s%> on you, but <S%H310>after<s%> that I will <S%H2308>quit.<s%>"

And he <S%H5221>struck<s%> them <S%H7785>ruthlessly<s%> <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3409><s%> with a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4347>slaughter;<s%> and he <S%H3381>went<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> and <S%H3427>lived<s%> in the <S%H5585>cleft<s%> of the <S%H5553>rock<s%> of <S%H5862>Etam.<s%>
Then the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H5927>went<s%> up and <S%H2583>camped<s%> in <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and <S%H6566>spread<s%> out in <S%H3896>Lehi.<s%>

And the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4100>"Why<s%> have you <S%H5927>come<s%> up <S%H5921>against<s%> us?" And they <S%H559>said,<s%> "We have <S%H5927>come<s%> up to <S%H631>bind<s%> <S%H8123>Samson<s%> in order to <S%H6213>do<s%> to him as he <S%H6213>did<s%> to us."

Then 3000 <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H3381>went<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H5585>cleft<s%> of the <S%H5553>rock<s%> of <S%H5862>Etam<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H8123>Samson,<s%> "Do you not <S%H3045>know<s%> that the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> are <S%H4910>rulers<s%> over us? <S%H4100>What<s%> then is <S%H2088>this<s%> that you have <S%H6213>done<s%> to us?" And he <S%H559>said<s%> to them, "As they <S%H6213>did<s%> to me, <S%H3651>so<s%> I have <S%H6213>done<s%> to them."

And they <S%H559>said<s%> to him, "We have <S%H3381>come<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H631>bind<s%> you so that we may <S%H5414>give<s%> you into the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines.<s%>" And <S%H8123>Samson<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to them, <S%H7650>"Swear<s%> to me that you will not <S%H6293>kill<s%> me."

So they <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H3808>"No,<s%> but we will <S%H631>bind<s%> you <S%H631>fast<s%> and <S%H5414>give<s%> you into their <S%H3027>hands;<s%> yet <S%H4191>surely<s%> we will not <S%H4191>kill<s%> you." Then they <S%H631>bound<s%> him with <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H5688>ropes<s%> and <S%H5927>brought<s%> him up from the <S%H5553>rock.<s%>

When he <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H3896>Lehi,<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H7321>shouted<s%> as they <S%H7122>met<s%> him. And the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H9484>came<s%> upon him <S%H9484>mightily<s%> so that the <S%H5688>ropes<s%> that were on his <S%H2220>arms<s%> were as <S%H6593>flax<s%> that is <S%H1197>burned<s%> with <S%H784>fire,<s%> and his <S%H612>bonds<s%> <S%H4549>dropped<s%> from his <S%H3027>hands.<s%>

And he <S%H4672>found<s%> a <S%H2961>fresh<s%> <S%H3895>jawbone<s%> of a <S%H2543>donkey,<s%> so he <S%H7971>reached<s%> <S%H3027><s%> out and <S%H3947>took<s%> it and <S%H5221>killed<s%> a <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> with it.

Then <S%H8123>Samson<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "With the <S%H3895>jawbone<s%> of a <S%H2543>donkey,<s%> <S%H2565>Heaps<s%> upon <S%H2565>heaps,<s%> With the <S%H3895>jawbone<s%> of a <S%H2543>donkey<s%> I have <S%H5221>killed<s%> a <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H376>men.<s%>"

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> about when he had <S%H3615>finished<s%> <S%H1696>speaking,<s%> that he <S%H7993>threw<s%> the <S%H3895>jawbone<s%> from his <S%H3027>hand;<s%> and he <S%H7121>named<s%> that <S%H4725>place<s%> Ramath-lehi.

Then he <S%H6770>became<s%> <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H6770>thirsty,<s%> and he <S%H7121>called<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "Thou hast <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H8668>deliverance<s%> by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of Thy <S%H5650>servant,<s%> and <S%H6258>now<s%> shall I <S%H4191>die<s%> of <S%H6772>thirst<s%> and <S%H5307>fall<s%> into the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of the <S%H6189>uncircumcised<s%>?"

But <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1234>split<s%> the <S%H4388>hollow<s%> place that is in <S%H3896>Lehi<s%> so that <S%H4325>water<s%> <S%H3318>came<s%> out of it. When he <S%H8354>drank,<s%> his <S%H7307>strength<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> and he <S%H2421>revived.<s%> <S%H5921>Therefore,<s%> <S%H3651><s%> he <S%H7121>named<s%> <S%H8034><s%> it En-hakkore, <S%H834>which<s%> is in <S%H3896>Lehi<s%> to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>
So he <S%H8199>judged<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines.<s%>
